doc.field: The Committee on Education and Labor was Brademas' primary committee during his tenure in Congress. This subseries contains materials related to his work on the General Subcommittee on Education (1967-68, 1973-74), Select Subcommittee on Education (1970-1980), Special Subcommittee on Education (1966-1969), and the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education (1959-1965, 1970-1980).

Documents include copies of bills, congressional reports, and hearing transcripts; correspondence with congressional colleagues and other government officials; floor books and committee markup binders; memos from staff and Brademas revealing legislative strategies and discussing negotiations of drafts of bills, amendments, and resolutions; news clippings; notes; and publications and correspondence from various agencies, organization, and businesses.
Series I : Legislative >> Subseries II: Education & Labor Committee
